title: Account was banned
body: I found my account was banned,but I didn't recive any e-mail.How can I know what happend to my account?How long does it ban.

replies.body:
I checked it out and seems somethin' odd happened behind the scenes. 
Don't worry though, I got some friends that can help you out 1 on 1 in a [**ticket here!**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Hi all, i've got my account  my account banned yesterday as well, no info no Email has been sent , its just a permanent ban, 

I have never violated any terms and conditions from riot

Regards
